description:
The Starter Clinics are part of the Career Creation suite of training programmes designed to impart year 2 undergraduates in NUS Business School with the core skills needed to plan and prepare for their careers. The workshops will take students through early and in-depth career
planning and train them in the concrete skills necessary for their eventual internship and job search.

The Starter Clinics are conducted in year 2 and serve as practicums for
their learning from year 1. The clinics are
1. Group Resume Critique
2. Group Mock Interview
title: Career Creation Starter Clinics
